summary: Replaces the strange bowls from Herbal Tea with actual tea cups (and other options).
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the strange bowl like models used in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33253/?]Herbal Tea[/url] by GustavL to proper teacups. There are also teapots and flagons as options.

If you want you can check out my own tea mod which is mainly designed around role-playing and is less bonus oriented - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63889/]Canis Root Tea[/url].

[size=3][size=5]
Requirements:[/size]
Skyrim
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33253/]Herbal Tea[/url] by GustavL - This mod will do nothing without this!

[/size][size=3][size=4]Compatibility[/size][/size]
It obviously overrides the textures from Herbal Tea. It should be compatible with everything.

[size=3][size=4]Credits
[size=3]Herbal Tea is made by GustavL. No part of the mod is redistributed.
Thank you to Stroti and Tamira for the teapot model and textures.[/size][/size][/size]
author: DSstryker
